metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39252 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause an out-of-bounds read in ntfs_ie_lookup inNTFS-3G < 2021.8.22.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g88 - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3').
